During the online operation, the SPS supplies DC output load directly from the AC-line input. The charger maintains a float charge on the batteries and recharges them when necessary. If the AC-line input fails, the output is disconnected from the AC-line input and is instead supplied by the internal batteries and DC-DC converter (On-Battery operation).
